title: A Sheet of Memory!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>To us, who have worked hard all year-! Cheers~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Cheers~! But it makes you feel a little guilty to have these parties in a row, doesn’t it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>We definitely have to have a party for Christmas~, and we also need to celebrate our hard work for the year. So this is a necessary party~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m happy to eat lots of Kanata-chan’s food!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>They’re this delicious even though they are low calorie, huh. I see you’ve also worked hard on your cooking research, Kanata<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Kanata-san is really a master of two sets of skills.... I have to try harder and aim for the top too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hey, how about if we take a commemoration photo together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I wonder if 10 people would fit in the frame? Should I be the one to take it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>What are you saying Shiotti! Come on, Rinari will take a great picture, so let’s gather around everyone~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Rina-chan’s selfie stick, ready.... *Snap*. Yeah, it’s a good picture. Let’s upload this to social media<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
